entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Tuesday 28 February 2023
